name: City Blaster
description:
Hello,

I make small arcade games in my free time with game engine Phaser 3.

I started this project because I wanted to see how far I can take the Phaser.js engine in making smaller but nevertheless fun engaging mobile games...

I remembered an old PC game named paratrooper I used to play at home...I believe it wasn't even the 90's yet so it was certainly a while ago.

I began this project with not really a specific goal only to see if I could be able to make an updated version with a few new twists here and there...

And after a few moths of programming I am finally able to launch "City Blaster".

I am very proud of this project because altough I am still in no ways an expert of Phaser I still managed to create a very solid game and gained a lot of experience...

So, well...enjoy this game (hope you do)...and let me know what you think of it...

and maybe I will make some more content out of it in the future..who knows!

Shoot away I would say! Let's see how long you survive...

Enjoy!
